traits.name: Draconic Devotion
entries: While the soldier can see a Dragon that isn't hostile to it, the soldier has advantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The soldier makes two Longsword or Javelin attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 2 (1d4 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4 damage) fire damage.
